langchain-ai/langgraph-swarm-py

Create multi-agent systems where agents dynamically hand off control

Related repos

  • framework for building and deploying stateful AI agents
  • Deploys stateful agents with persistence and human-in-the-loop interactions
  • Coordinate specialized agents in Python with LangGraph Supervisor, a library for managing multi-agent workflows using a central supervisor
  • code examples for building AI agents that use language models and tools to make decisions and run tasks
  • experimental Python framework for lightweight multi-agent AI orchestration
  • Framework for self-evolving autonomous language agents
  • Python package for building advanced AI agents with planning, subagents, file system, and custom prompts
  • multi-agent orchestration framework for AI workflows
  • Framework for running distributed reinforcement learning training swarms over the internet
